profile_summary:
Hoa NgX is a highly skilled software engineer and project manager with a strong background in developing innovative solutions using JavaScript, C++, and Swift. With a solid foundation in React, React Native, and PHP, particularly with the Laravel framework, Hoa has established himself as a versatile and dependable professional in the tech industry. His expertise in MySQL and Linux further underscores his ability to design, implement, and manage complex projects from inception to deployment. As a seasoned developer with a significant network of peers, Hoa has built a reputation for delivering high-quality results and collaborating effectively with his team.

With a portfolio of 91 public repositories and a growing network of 18 followers, Hoa demonstrates his commitment to ongoing learning, professional growth, and community engagement. His unique blend of technical skills, project management acumen, and collaborative mindset makes him an invaluable asset to any development team. By leveraging his expertise in React, JavaScript, and PHP, Hoa continues to drive innovation and excellence in the software engineering landscape. As a dedicated and results-driven professional, Hoa is poised to make a lasting impact in the tech industry, and his contributions are eagerly anticipated by his peers and the broader developer community.
